documents.content: Memorial Regional Hospital submitted a claims adjustment for patient ID# P-88245-ZQT regarding a complex cardiac ablation procedure performed on 2023-09-14. The claim was initially denied due to missing pre-authorization documents from Dr. Elena Vasquez of Coastal Cardiology Associates. Patient demographics indicate a 62-year-old male residing at 2842 Ocean View Drive, Huntington Beach, CA.

Internal memo from BlueWave Insurance dated 2023-10-02 details policy changes for advanced cardiac procedures requiring dual specialist approval. The update specifically mentions Dr. Vasquez's utilization patterns for ablation treatments and introduces new documentation requirements for patients over 60 with arrhythmia histories. Huntington Beach providers will be priority targets for education sessions.

Huntington Beach Tribune health section reports on increased cardiac procedure denials (Oct 2023 edition). Article quotes patient advocate Derek Metcalf speaking about P-88245-ZQT's case: 'Insurers are creating unnecessary hurdles for essential treatments.' Mentions Coastal Cardiology's 40% appeal success rate for ablation claims over the past quarter.

Cardiology research note from 2023-08-15 documents P-88245-ZQT's diagnostic history including persistent atrial fibrillation and mild mitral valve regurgitation. Treatment protocol lists amiodarone 200mg daily and recommended ablation if medication proves insufficient. Signed by Dr. Raj Patel, MD at Memorial Regional's electrophysiology department.

Provider quality audit shows Coastal Cardiology's ablation procedures have 92% success rates but average $18,500 per case (Sept 2023 report). Notes outlier case P-88245-ZQT required extended operation time due to anatomical variations. Lists contact phone (714) 555-0198 for audit committee questions.

Patient satisfaction survey from 2842 Ocean View Drive completed 2023-11-01 mentions excellent nursing care but frustration with insurance approvals. Free text notes state: 'Almost cancelled my life-saving procedure because of BlueWave's paperwork delays.' Survey ID# S-77472-JVN.
